title: Remco Evenepoel Calls Out UAE Tactics, Luke Plapp Powers into Yellow at Paris-Nice
content:
Brandon McNulty defends podium spot: 'We didn't get much help. There's more than just us in the race who want to win.'

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel Calls Out UAE Tactics, Luke Plapp Powers into Yellow at Paris-Nice on Velo.
author: ahood
